attributes.action: Prevent use of two-stroke engines within the UK
attributes.additional_details: Prevent the sale of new two-stroke engines and look to phase out all two-stroke engines where currently in use, providing incentives to switch to the use of cleaner technologies such as electric motors, four-stroke engines, etc. Set a deadline for when all two-stroke engine use will become illegal in the UK.  This ban will help make a significant, and quick, reduction of pollution in our environment.
